title: My wife and I's 5 year anniversary is on the 25th
body:
I have no idea what to get her.

anyone have some ideas? we'll probably go out on a nice dinner date, but tbh, I wanna get her something to help cheer her up, she's been kinda down lately with a lot of negative things happening in life.

she doesn't play video games at all as an fyi

i don't really talk about IRL here much if ever, but i figured its worth a shot (we got married at 18)
